document_data.name: Sisters of Life and Mercy
document_data.orgname: the Sisters of Life and Mercy
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sisters of Life and Mercy''' were a select group of [[priestess]]es of [[Shiallia]], the Lady of the Woods.
document_data.Activities: The Sisters were active within the [[High Forest]] of [[northwest Faerûn]], ministering Shiallia's teachings to the good creatures of the forest. The High Forest was not without its perils. Because of this, members of the Sisters of Life and Mercy were always accompanied by a trio of [[swanmay]] [[ranger]]s from the [[Shields of Hope]] who protected them during their travels.
